Class SMTPClient.Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • SMTPClient.Response
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<String>
    Enclosing class:
    SMTPClient
    private static class SMTPClient.Response
extends Object
implements Iterable<String>
    Container for server responses.

    Provides a static method to handle waiting for and reading responses.

      Default constructor.

      • iterator

        public Iterator<String> iterator()
        Provides an iterator over the lines of the response text.

        Iterator cannot be used to modify the response, remove() has no effect.

        Specified by:
